headerData.title: El reto de humanizar el CX financiero en 2021
headerData.date: Miercoles 16 de Diciembre | 17 HS (Horario de Quito)

details: We invite you to this webinar, where we will discuss how to humanize the Banking and Insurance customer experience in the new digital environment.
We will also be able to learn about the strategies applied by LOREM to generate a memorable experience for its clients, while it became the great unicorn of LATAM.
Hear first-hand the voice of our specialists
eventInfoData.finalMessage: Participa e inspirate para innovar y mejorar la interacción entre clientes y marcas con historias de exito de empresas del ambito financiero en America Latina.
